attributes.action: respect pensioners in this current economic climate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once again pensioners have been forgotten in the Queens speech, it is time pensioners are treated as equal members of society and not swept aside as so often in the past. The reduction in vat is useless to most pensioners who have seen their income greatly reduced in real terms. Do something to offset the falling interest rates and help those who have been a little thrifty and saved for their retirement. Pensioners appear to be the only members of society not catered for. URGENT ACTION IS REQUIRED NOW before many die of hypothermia this winter.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
